title: sample inventory
description: sample inventory metadata for an IC Electrophysiology session during a Patch-seq experiment. Source: BCDC Sample Inventory Metadata Template.

modality.description: Name of data modality. Used to categorize data at a high level. See Controlled Vocabulary.

technique.description: Differentiates between  data types within a modality. See Controlled Vocabulary.

anatomicalStructure.description: Name of anatomical structure from which sample was obtained. See Controlled Vocabulary.

subspecimenType.description: Type of subspecimen counted. Use the Specimen Types in the Controlled Vocabulary.

totalProcessedSubspecimens.description: Total number of quality-controlled subspecimens from this sample (e.g., #cells from a sample; if there are no subspecimens, may be =1)

organization.description: Full name of originating organization. See Controlled Vocabulary.

grantNumber.description: Identification number of the grant supporting this effort. See Controlled Vocabulary.

dataCollection.$ref: ref a Collection schema ID here?
dataCollection.description: BCDC code for project that describes a given dataset; reflects grouping of data for reporting purposes. See Controlled Vocabulary.

R24Name.description: Name of R24 archive that has received the files associated with this sample. See Controlled Vocabulary.

R24Link.description: Direct link to publicly accessible dataset at the R24 archive. If unknown, leave blank.

comments.description: Lab provided information that may be useful for describing the sample or experiment.

metadataSubmission.description: Year and Quarter of initial metadata submission for a sample.
